A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Even though this movie was far from perfect and there’s more than a few things I would have done differently\, it was more than an entertaining installment in the Star Wars Saga....where the Force Awakens played it safe\, the Last Jedi took risks...some great\, some not so much. The movie could have also been about a half hour shorter..... Saw it again today and it added some clarity... I really thought it was great the second time around. Us Star Wars fans can go into these movies with almost unreasonable expectations hoping to get the next Empire and it’ll never happen.
